name: acuitySchedulingTrigger
description: Handle Acuity Scheduling events via webhooks

options.name: appointment.canceled
options.description: Is called whenever an appointment is canceled

options.name: appointment.changed
options.description: Is called when the appointment is changed in any way

options.name: appointment.rescheduled
options.description: Is called when the appointment is rescheduled to a new time

options.name: appointment.scheduled
options.description: Is called once when an appointment is initially booked

options.name: order.completed
options.description: Is called when an order is completed

properties.name: resolveData
properties.description: By default does the webhook-data only contain the ID of the object. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
